item.description:
Hey Everybody! If you haven't already, come check out Sierra Club & Beer! If you have, please come back :). Join us at Orleans Bar and Restaurant on Wed., June 7th at 6:30 p.m. for another chance to relax and have a good time with like-minded people. Discuss creative solutions, learn about what's happening locally, and find out about opportunities to get involved.

Cash bar, limited free appetizers.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club & Beer!
